options.content:
# Templar Version: ${templar_version}

Version data is automatically fetched from the version API

targets.query:
from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "loss_random_before")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "validator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^\d+$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with window_int: int(v: r.window) }))
  |> group(columns: ["uid"], mode:"by")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["window_int"], columnKey: ["uid"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["window_int"], desc: false)

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "loss_random_before")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "validator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^\d+$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "peer_update_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "validator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^\d+$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "model_update_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "validator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^\d+$/)

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "window_total_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "validator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^\d+$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gather_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "validator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^\d+$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "evaluation_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "validator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^\d+$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total_skipped")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "validator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^\d+$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "validator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^\d+$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.global_step)
  |> drop(columns: ["_value"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "global_step", "uid"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: int(v: r.global_step) }))
  |> group(columns: ["uid"])  // Group by uid so that each table is per UID
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "uid"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 8m, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "global_step")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "validator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^\d+$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.window)
  |> drop(columns: ["_value"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "window", "uid"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: int(v: r.window) }))
  |> group(columns: ["uid"])  // Group by uid so that each table is per UID
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "uid"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 8m, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "window")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gather_success_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "validator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^\d+$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "learning_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "validator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^\d+$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total_peers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "validator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^\d+$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "evaluated_uids_count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "validator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^\d+$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> group(columns: ["uid"])
  |> yield(name: "_value")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gather_success_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "validator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^\d+$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Mtraining_step_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "loss")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^${uid:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "miner")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Mtraining_step_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "tokens_per_sec")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /^${uid:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "miner")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group()
  |> top(n: 20, columns: ["_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "uid"])
  |> yield(name: "global_top_20_mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_scores")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "weight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] == "${validator_uid}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["eval_uid"] =~ /^${uid:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "eval_uid"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["eval_uid", "_value"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> yield(name: "weight_per_eval_uid")

// Get timestamps 
start = v.timeRangeStart
stop = v.timeRangeStop

// If the time range is greater than 1 hour, limit to most recent hour
adjustedStart = if (int(v: stop) - int(v: start)) > 3600000000000 then 
  time(v: int(v: stop) - 3600000000000) 
else 
  start

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: adjustedStart, stop: stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Vvalidator_scores")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "weight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] == "${validator_uid}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["eval_uid"] =~ /^${uid:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "eval_uid"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

// Get timestamps 
start = v.timeRangeStart
stop = v.timeRangeStop

// If the time range is greater than 1 hour, limit to most recent hour
adjustedStart = if (int(v: stop) - int(v: start)) > 3600000000000 then 
  time(v: int(v: stop) - 3600000000000) 
else 
  start

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: adjustedStart, stop: stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_scores")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gradient_score")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] == "${validator_uid}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["eval_uid"] =~ /^${uid:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${templar_version}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_netuid"] == "3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["config_project"] == "templar")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "eval_uid"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"

v1.tagValues(
  bucket: "tplr",
  tag: "uid",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2" and r.role == "validator" and r.config_netuid == "3" and r.config_project == "templar" and r.version == "${templar_version}"
)
  |> sort()
list.label: Validator Uid
list.name: validator_uid
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"

v1.tagValues(
  bucket: "tplr",
  tag: "uid",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2" and r.role == "validator" and r.config_netuid == "3" and r.config_project == "templar" and r.version == "${templar_version}"
)
  |> sort()
